reviewText: This recipe is delicious.  It is easy to make. It work beautifully to cover cakes.  Even my friends that say they don't like fondant they like this one.  My kids specially, they are always hoping I will have some fondant left for them to eat. This DVD will help you make fondant like a pro.

Making Fabulous Fondant is the Bible of hand made fondant.  The instructions are clear and the complete process is demonstrated.  You can truly make fabulous fondant and cover your cake with it.  I feel that anyone viewing this instructional DVD can have success in their cake-making endeavors.

I bought these dvds for my wife and she has watched them several times and is loving learning how to make cakes.  Shes now making cakes for everyone in our extended family.  Excellent video and let's be honest, I get to eat her leftover cakes.
